Class Product

java.lang.Object
model.Product
Direct Known Subclasses:
NonPerishableProduct, PerishableProduct
public abstract class Product extends Object
The abstract base class for all products sold in the store. Contains common attributes including name, price, stock, brand, and variant.
Version:
1.5
Author:
BENITO_RAMOS

  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      public Product(String productID, String name, double price, int quantityInStock, List<String> subcategories, String brand, String variant)
      Constructs a new Product.
      Parameters:
      productID - (String) The unique ID for the product.
      name - (String) The display name for the product.
      price - (double) The retail price of the product.
      quantityInStock - (int) The number of units in stock.
      subcategories - (List) A list of category tags.
      brand - (String) The brand name of the product (can be null or empty).
      variant - (String) The variant of the product (e.g., "Zero", "500ml", can be null or empty).

  • Method Details

    • isLowStock

      public boolean isLowStock()
      Checks if the item's stock is low (5 or less).
      Returns:
      (boolean) true if quantity is invalid input: '<'= 5, false otherwise.

    • reduceStock

      public boolean reduceStock(int quantity)
      Reduces the stock quantity by a specified amount.
      Parameters:
      quantity - (int) The amount to sell.
      Returns:
      (boolean) true if stock was sufficient and reduced, false otherwise.

    • displayDetails

      public String displayDetails()
      Generates a detailed display string for the product, including brand and variant. This method is now concrete and can be overridden by children.
      Returns:
      (String) A formatted string with product details.

    • getSubcategoriesString

      public String getSubcategoriesString()
      Helper method to get a single, comma-separated string of subcategories.
      Returns:
      (String) e.g., "Food, Ready-to-eat, Sandwich"

    • getBrandAndVariant

      public String getBrandAndVariant()
      Helper method to combine brand and variant into a single, clean string.
      Returns:
      (String) e.g., "Coke (Zero)", "Dove", "1L"

      public String getProductID()
